author: MSNBC
title: A Latina creates a platform to provide scholarships for STEM students
description: A first-of-its-kind scholarship platform aims to provide access to Latinos and underserved students who are interested in pursuing a career in STEM.
content: A Latina has created a platform to provide access to scholarships worth almost $38 million for Latinos and other students interested in pursuing science, technology, engineering and math (STEM) careeâ€¦ [+4640 chars]
